metadata.title: CVE-2020-27153 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In BlueZ before 5.55, a double free was found in the gatttooldisconnect_cb() routine from shared/att.c. A remote attacker couldpotentially cause a denial of service or code execution, during servicediscovery, due to a redundant disconnect MGMT event.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27153` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bluetooth - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
bluez - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
bluez-cups - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
bluez-hcidump - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
bluez-obexd - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
bluez-tests - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
libbluetooth3 - 5.48-0ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bluez package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.48-0ubuntu3.5').
